attributes.action: To make Anglophobia  a form of Hate Speech
attributes.additional_details:
On the 7th day of the 7th Month the Terrorist Attack in Britain caused the largest loss of life from an act separate from War. 

It's roots lay in Anglophobia. Subsequent attacks in the UK have also been based around Anglophobia along with the desecration of War Memorials and national monuments.

People are afraid that their very presence and way of life are constantly being undermined by this form of discrimination.
attributes.background:
To make  Anglophobia
 (from Latin Anglus "English" and Greek φόβος, phobos, "fear"), refers to opposition, dislike, fear, hatred, oppression, persecution, and discrimination of English people and/or England).

A Hate Speech and  thus a criminal offence.

rejection.details:
A crime can already be prosecuted as a hate crime if the offence has demonstrated hostility based on race or been motivated by hostility based on race.

You can find out more about hate crime here: https://www.cps.gov.uk/crime-info/hate-crime
